heading: Diablo 4 Season 4 Mid-Season Update â€“ Updates & New Guides
content: Season 4 is running for a few weeks now and the is excited to release our massive Mid-Season 4 Update. You can see the full . This Maxroll update has a ton of Build Guides updates as well as the release of two whole new Build Guides: have been updated, including . You can use our search bar to find any , Side Quest, Dungeon, or other Resources. Let's dive in and see everything on offer for this update! The changes in this patch are aimed at buffing classes and builds that are not performing as well as their counterparts. The difficulty of the Pit to ensure that most builds are able to get to Tier 60 to get their final tier of Masterworking materials: Significant changes includes a severe nerf to Holy Bolts, a huge buff to Andariel's Visage. The stat requirements for non-main stats has been reduced from 90 to 60 per Paragon Board. Druid sees a lot of buffs overall, as well as Necromancer Sacrifices. Don't know what playstyle you're looking for? See the lists below to choose your class and embark on an adventure. They are great in helping assist you along the way. We'll be testing these builds and making adjustments where required, along with creating new builds throughout the Season! The Mid-Season 4 patch reveals two clear winners when it comes to endgame: ! Read our Build Guides for these builds and make sure to dominate Sanctuary for good! Also make sure to take a look at our new Build Guides: It wouldn't be a complete Mid-Season 4 Update without Tier List updates! Tier Lists are a great way to see how different builds and classes stack up against each other in various parts of the game. The which is your go-to to look for a good build for all activities, including Nightmare Dungeons, has been updated carefully! has also been heavily updated with the latest changes. Go get those coveted The Diablo 4 Maxroll Team is always looking for the best resources out there to bring you the best content at all times; In this regard, we welcome as our new Barbarian Guide writer! You can find him With this update, a lot of excitement is waiting for us. Many of our Diablo Team members will be streaming for the mid-season update. Below you will find links to their stream, so you can watch and learn along with them. We hope you enjoy the Season of Loot Reborn with the aid of our Mid-Season 4 update. We're continuing to work on more updates for various Build Guides, Resources and If you haven't already, head over to our and select the to stay up to date with our content development. Written by: Reviewed by:
